sentence: Those fully endorsed 2022 E-PAC candidates include: Esther Joy King (IL-17) Amanda Adkins (KS-03) Karoline Leavitt (NH-01) April Becker (NV-03) Lisa Scheller (PA-07) Monica De La Cruz (TX-15) Jen Kiggans (VA-02) Jeanine Lawson (VA-10) Tanya Contreras Wheeless (AZ-04) Anna Paulina Luna (FL-13) Erin Houchin (IN-09) Annie Black (NV-04) Liz Joy (NY-20) Madison Gesiotto Gilbert (OH-13) Lori Chavez-DeRemer (OR-05) Morgan Ortagus (TN-05) Cassy Gracia (TX-28) Mayra Flores (TX-34) E-PAC also released a list of "Women to Watch," including: Jan Kulmann (CO-08) Barbara Kirkmeyer (CO-08) Catalina Lauf (IL-11) Cassandra Tanner Miller (IL-11) Regan Deering (IL-13) Theresa Gavarone (OH-09) Jessica De La Cruz (RI-02) Kalena Bruce (MO-04) Sarah Walsh (MO-04) Yesli Vega (VA-07) Townhall got in touch with one of those women, Jan Kulmann, mayor of Thornton, Colorado.
author: Rebecca Downs
title: Elise Stefanik's E-PAC Announces Endorsements with Bid to Elect GOP Women in Historic Numbers
